amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the resolving clause and insert a complete new text to the Budget.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yarmuth amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 272 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Yarmuth.
